## NodeImage class

A limited Node implementation for DOM HTMLImageElement.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeImage extends NodeImageBitmapConsumer implements IImage 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [complete](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.complete.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Is the image loaded? |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.height.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The DOM display height of the image. |
|  [naturalHeight](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.naturalheight.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The actual height of the image. |
|  [naturalWidth](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.naturalwidth.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The actual width of the image. |
|  [src](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.src.md) |  | <code>string</code> | The source URL of the image. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.width.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The DOM display width of the image. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [removeAttribute(attr)](./canvas-cleave.nodeimage.removeattribute.md) |  | Unset the DOM width and height parameters. |
